head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Optional) The type of PDF object that this dictionary describes; if present, is MediaClip for a media clip dictionary.

(Required) The subtype of media clip that this dictionary describes. May be MCD for media clip data or MCS for a media clip section. The media clip is considered non-viable if the conforming reader does not recognize the value of this entry.
(Optional) The name of the media clip, for use in the user interface.
